Title: Waives the fee for a commercial driver's license for a member of the military or a veteran
Summary: Waives the fee for a commercial driver's license for a member of the military or a veteran when they submit an application for military skills test waiver as part of their application.
LawCode: Amd ยง503, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to waiving the fee for a commercial driver's license for a member of the military or a veteran
